thread.title: Benjamin Netanyahu says he favors pardon for Hebron shooter Elor Azaria - Breaking News - Jerusalem Post
thread.title_full: Benjamin Netanyahu says he favors pardon for Hebron shooter Elor Azaria - Breaking News - Jerusalem Post

author: Herb Keinon
title: Benjamin Netanyahu says he favors pardon for Hebron shooter Elor Azaria - Breaking News - Jerusalem Post
text:
February 23, 2017 10:15 Breaking news. (photo credit:JPOST STAFF) 
SYDNEY - Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday that he remained in favor of a pardon for recently-sentenced IDF soldier Elor Azariya, saying that the “problem” was not the 18-month sentence for manslaughter of a subdued Palestinian attacker in March 2015, but rather the “circumstances” that created the incident.Netanyahu told reporters it was necessary to take into consideration the difficult circumstances young soldiers are thrust into during a wave of terrorism when they have to make extremely difficult decisions. His concern, he said, is that the next soldier might feel threatened, and not know “where the limits are.” Share this article via
